p.s: The given sequence is a scene from the movie The Hate U Give, wichwhich was directed by George Tillmann Jr. in 2018.
The movie is mostly about Starr, the main character, and her life as a black teenager.
This specific scene introduces Starr and her boyfriend Chris and how the relationship between them is.
The scene starts with Chris walking through the hallway of the school and greeting some people on the way over to Starr.
Starr is standing at her locker and observing him while he walks.
Chris walks up behind her and puts his headphones on her.
She listens to the sound before taking the headphones ofoff to talk to him.
They have a conversation about a situation that had happendhappened a while back where Chris tried to sleep with Starr even though she she didn't want to.
He apologises and starts talking about the beat he had made for her and if she liked it.
When he hears her say it's only okay, he starts dancing with the beat on in the middle of the hallway.
They start laughing and Starr pulls him by his arm to go somewhere else.
